thread.title: Russia says Trump invited Putin to U.S. during phone call | Russian Insight

title: Russia says Trump invited Putin to U.S. during phone call | Russian Insight
text:
Russia says Trump invited Putin to U.S. during phone call April 20, 2018 | Reuters | Shares: 397 
MOSCOW (Reuters) â€“ U.S. President Donald Trump invited his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin to the United States during a phone call, and said he would be glad to see Putin in the White House, RIA Novosti reported on Friday, citing the Russian Foreign Ministry.
